article: one of the top four serb generals sought by the u.n. war crimes tribunal for alleged atrocities committed in kosovo will surrender voluntarily , but needs more time to prepare his defense because of a serious illness , his lawyer said monday .
abstract: another serb army general wanted for war crimes to surrender to the hague his lawyer says
